headline: Hoka's Slowing Sales Growth Could Lift Nike, Jefferies Analysts Say
summary: Nike is poised to regain market share in the athletic footwear space as sales growth for Deckers Outdoor's Hoka brand has started to slow, Jefferies analysts wrote.

raw.headline: Hoka's Slowing Sales Growth Could Lift Nike, Jefferies Analysts Say
raw.summary: Nike is poised to regain market share in the athletic footwear space as sales growth for Deckers Outdoor's Hoka brand has started to slow, Jefferies analysts wrote.

headline: Nike Preps Price Hikes While Planning Return to Amazon
summary: While the company didn’t mention the threat of tariffs, Nike is heavily exposed in China, home to roughly 24% of its suppliers. The post Nike Preps Price Hikes While Planning Return to Amazon appeared first on The Daily Upside.

headline: NIKE INC : UBS remains Neutral
summary: UBS analyst Robert Krankowski maintains his Neutral opinion on the stock. The target price remains unchanged at USD 56.

headline: Nike Plans to Increase Prices Next Week and Resume Selling on Amazon
summary: NIKE, Inc. (NYSE:NKE) stated it will resume direct sales on Amazon after a six-year break and elevate the pricing for certain adult products beginning next week. Price increases ranging from $2 to $10 will be applied to equipment and apparel. There will be a $5 increase for shoes priced between $100 and $150 and a […]
